markdownRemark.html: Machines are not meant to be feared. They are not intended only for certain people. Machines are made to be handled by humans to do things we are not capable upon our own. Learn to harness the power of all machines.

frontmatter.description: Machines are made to be handled by humans to do things we are not capable upon our own. Learn to harness the power of all machines.
frontmatter.title: Machines should not be feared
